name: angular-validation-message
description: angular directive that inserts validation message right after your validating control

scripts.compile: npm run compile:es2015 && npm run compile:es5
scripts.compile:es2015: npm run ngc -- -p src/tsconfig-es2015.json && npm run rollup -- build/angular-validation-message.js -o dist/angular-validation-message.js -f es
scripts.compile:es5: npm run ngc -- -p src/tsconfig-es5.json && npm run rollup -- build/angular-validation-message.js -o dist/angular-validation-message.es5.js -f es
scripts.copy:assets: npm run cpy -- "**/*.*" "!**/*.js" "../dist" --parents --cwd=build && npm run cpy -- src/package.json dist && npm run cpy -- README.md dist && npm run cpy -- CHANGELOG.md dist
scripts.clean:tests: npm run rimraf -- coverage && npm run rimraf -- "tests/**/*.+(js|js.map|d.ts|metadata.json)"
scripts.lint: npm run lint-ts && npm run lint-js && npm run lint-css
scripts.test: npm run clean:tests && karma start karma.conf.js
scripts.test:watch: npm run clean:tests && karma start karma.conf.debug.js
